title: Discovery QRD-044: paradigm_shift
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(QuantumAlgorithm) exhibits novel properties under paradigm_shift transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: A pioneering deterministic modular paradigm inversion of Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(QuantumAlgorithm) with proprietary unique advantages challenging fundamental assumptions through distributed parallel innovation through 2 interaction patterns

function apply_paradigm_shift(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(QuantumAlgorithm))
